list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a plan or drawing produced to show the look and function or workings of a building, garment, or other object before it is built or made.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he has just unveiled his design for the new museum
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ta vừa tiết lộ thiết kế của mình cho bảo tàng mới

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an arrangement of lines or shapes created to form a pattern or decoration.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: pottery with a lovely blue and white design
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: gốm với một thiết kế màu xanh và trắng đáng yêu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: purpose, planning, or intention that exists or is thought to exist behind an action, fact, or material object.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the appearance of design in the universe
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sự xuất hiện của thiết kế trong vũ trụ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: decide upon the look and functioning of (a building, garment, or other object), by making a detailed drawing of it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a number of architectural students were designing a factory
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một số sinh viên kiến trúc đang thiết kế một nhà máy
